meta.title: EchoNote - Smart Voice Transcription & Calendar Management
meta.description: Privacy-first local solution for intelligent voice transcription and calendar management. Open source desktop application with local processing.
meta.keywords: voice transcription, speech recognition, calendar management, local processing, privacy protection, open source, desktop application
meta.author: EchoNote Team

hero.title: EchoNote
hero.description: Privacy-first local solution for intelligent voice transcription and calendar management that's smart, secure, and efficient.

features.0: üîí Complete privacy protection with local processing

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All data processed locally on your device. No cloud uploads required, ensuring complete privacy protection for your sensitive information.

local.title: Local Processing
local.description: Powerful local speech recognition and processing capabilities. Works completely offline without requiring internet connection.

smart.title: Smart Management
smart.description: Intelligent calendar integration that automatically extracts time, dates, and event information from your speech input.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Native desktop application available for Windows, macOS, and Linux with consistent user experience across all platforms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about EchoNote

whatIs.question: What is EchoNote?
whatIs.answer: EchoNote is a privacy-first desktop application for intelligent voice transcription and calendar management that processes all data locally on your device.
details: Advanced speech recognition using OpenAI Whisper technology
Intelligent calendar integration with natural language processing
Complete offline functionality with no cloud dependencies
Cross-platform support for Windows, macOS, and Linux

free.question: Is EchoNote free to use?
free.answer: Yes, EchoNote is completely free and open source under the Apache 2.0 license.
details: No subscription fees or premium tiers
Full access to all features without limitations
Open source code available for review and contribution

platforms.question: What platforms does EchoNote support?
platforms.answer: EchoNote supports Windows 10+, macOS 10.14+, and Linux distributions.
details: Windows 10 and Windows 11 with native performance
macOS Mojave (10.14) and later versions
Major Linux distributions including Ubuntu, Fedora, and Debian
Consistent user experience across all platforms

offline.question: Does EchoNote require an internet connection?
offline.answer: No, EchoNote works completely offline. All voice processing is done locally on your device for maximum privacy.
details: Local speech recognition without cloud dependencies
All data remains on your device at all times
No network requests for core functionality
Optional internet connection only for software updates

accuracy.question: How accurate is the voice transcription?
accuracy.answer: EchoNote achieves over 95% transcription accuracy using advanced local speech recognition technology.
details: State-of-the-art OpenAI Whisper model for speech recognition
Continuous improvement through model updates
Support for multiple languages and accents
Real-time processing with minimal latency

privacy.question: How does EchoNote protect my privacy?
privacy.answer: EchoNote processes all data locally on your device with no cloud uploads, ensuring complete privacy protection.
details: Zero data transmission to external servers
Local encryption for stored transcriptions
No user tracking or analytics collection
GDPR compliant by design

calendar.question: How does calendar integration work?
calendar.answer: EchoNote automatically extracts dates, times, and events from your speech and integrates with your existing calendar applications.
details: Natural language processing for date and time extraction
Integration with Google Calendar, Outlook, and Apple Calendar
Smart event creation with automatic scheduling
Conflict detection and resolution suggestions

languages.question: What languages does EchoNote support?
languages.answer: Currently, EchoNote supports English with additional languages planned for future releases.
details: Full English language support with high accuracy
Multi-language support in development roadmap
Community contributions welcome for language expansion
Interface available in English, Chinese, and French

support.question: How can I get help or support?
support.answer: EchoNote offers multiple support channels including community forums, documentation, and direct issue reporting.
details: GitHub Discussions for community Q&A
Comprehensive documentation and tutorials
GitHub Issues for bug reports and feature requests
Active community of users and contributors

contribute.question: How can I contribute to EchoNote?
contribute.answer: EchoNote welcomes contributions from developers of all skill levels through code, documentation, testing, and community support.
details: Code contributions through GitHub pull requests
Documentation improvements and translations
Bug testing and quality assurance
Community support and user assistance

message.placeholder: Please describe your feedback in detail...

privacy.notice: Your feedback helps us improve EchoNote. We respect your privacy and will only use this information to address your feedback.

success.title: Thank You!
